name: Create multi-channel content with O3 Director & GPT-4 specialist agents

parameters.content:
=======================================
            WORKFLOW ASSISTANCE
=======================================
For any questions or support, please contact:
    Yaron@nofluff.online

# Create Multi-Channel Content with O3 Director & GPT-4 Specialist Agents

This n8n workflow creates a **complete AI-powered content department**. It starts when a chat request is received, then a **Content Director Agent** (powered by OpenAI O3) analyzes the request and delegates tasks to specialized agents (blogs, social, video, email, website, strategy). Each agent is powered by **GPT-4.1-mini**, keeping costs low and quality high.

---

## ‚úÖ **üì© Section 1: Trigger & Director Setup**

### ‚öôÔ∏è **Nodes**

1Ô∏è‚É£ **When Chat Message Received**

* **What it does:** Starts the workflow whenever a user sends a content request.
* **Why it‚Äôs useful:** Allows real-time or on-demand content creation from chat inputs.

2Ô∏è‚É£ **Content Director Agent (O3)**

* **What it does:** Analyzes user request, defines the best content mix, and delegates tasks to specialist agents.
* **Why it‚Äôs useful:** Keeps your brand voice consistent and ensures all channels align to a unified content strategy.

---

### üí° **Beginner Benefit**

‚úÖ Single entry point ‚Üí just type your content idea once
‚úÖ AI Director coordinates everything for you
‚úÖ No need to manage multiple tools

---

## ‚úÖ **üë• Section 2: Specialist Content Agents**

Each request gets routed to one (or several) of these agents, depending on the strategy.

3Ô∏è‚É£ **Blog Content Writer**

* Long-form articles, editorials, and thought leadership pieces.

4Ô∏è‚É£ **Social Media Content Creator**

* Social posts, captions, hashtags, and community content.

5Ô∏è‚É£ **Video Script Writer**

* YouTube scripts, explainer videos, and video marketing content.

6Ô∏è‚É£ **Email Newsletter Writer**

* Campaigns, nurture sequences, and newsletter copy.

7Ô∏è‚É£ **Website Copy Specialist**

* Landing pages, product descriptions, and conversion-focused web copy.

8Ô∏è‚É£ **Content Strategist & Planner**
* Editorial calendars, campaign planning, and audience strategy.

---

### üí° **Beginner Benefit**

‚úÖ Each agent is an expert in its field
‚úÖ Powered by **GPT-4.1-mini** ‚Üí faster and cheaper
‚úÖ Parallel execution ‚Üí all content types can be generated at once

---

## ‚úÖ **üß† Section 3: Language Models & Execution Flow**

* **O3 Model ‚Üí Content Director**

  * Handles analysis, strategy, and delegation.

* **GPT-4.1-mini ‚Üí All Specialists**

  * Powers blog, social, video, email, website, and strategy agents.

* **Think Node**

  * Helps the Content Director organize reasoning before delegating tasks.

---

### üí° **Beginner Benefit**

‚úÖ AI Director (O3) = smart leadership
‚úÖ Specialists (GPT-4.1-mini) = cost-efficient execution
‚úÖ Built-in reasoning = better, more aligned campaigns

---

## üìä **Workflow Overview**

| Section                     | What Happens                                                    | Key Benefit                |
| --------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------- |
| üì© Trigger & Director Setup | Workflow starts from chat ‚Üí Content Director interprets request | Centralized control        |
| üë• Specialist Agents        | Each AI agent produces tailored content                         | Multi-channel coverage     |
| üß† Models & Flow            | O3 for Director, GPT-4.1-mini for specialists                   | Cost-efficient + strategic |

---

## üìå **How You Benefit Overall**

‚úÖ One input ‚Üí full content campaign
‚úÖ Consistent brand voice across all platforms
‚úÖ Cost-effective (O3 only for strategy, GPT-4.1-mini for bulk work)
‚úÖ Ready-to-publish content in minutes

---

‚ú® You‚Äôve basically built an **AI marketing department inside n8n** ‚Äî no extra staff required! üöÄ

---

parameters.toolDescription: call this AI Agent that specializes in blog content writing, long-form articles, editorial content, and thought leadership pieces
call this AI Agent that specializes in social media content creation, posts, captions, hashtags, and community engagement content
call this AI Agent that specializes in video script writing, YouTube content, explainer videos, and video marketing scripts
call this AI Agent that specializes in email newsletter writing, campaign creation, nurture sequences, and email marketing content
call this AI Agent that specializes in website copywriting, landing pages, product descriptions, and conversion-focused content
call this AI Agent that specializes in content strategy, editorial calendars, content planning, and brand voice development
